contents:
搜索厨房和油烟，在中文网站看起来有不少资料，搜索了一下英文的关键字，找到了一些文章（就单纯是看到内容有关就放进来，不保证内容的准确性，而且有些看起来有点旧，不知道是否过时或已被推翻）。

Association of cooking oil fumes exposure with lung cancer: involvement of inhibitor of apoptosis proteins in cell survival and proliferation in vitro.
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/17229588

Exposure to Cooking Fumes and Acute Reversible Decrement in Lung Functional Capacity.
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/28970595

Exposure to Cooking Oil Fumes and Oxidative Damages: A Longitudinal Study in Chinese Military Cooks
Published online 2012 Sep 12
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4029104/

Association of cooking oil fumes exposure with lung cancer: involvement of inhibitor of apoptosis proteins in cell survival and proliferation in vitro.
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/17229588

Short term exposure to cooking fumes and pulmonary function
Published online 2009 May 4. 
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2685804/

Hazards of Breathing Oil Smoke
https://sciencing.com/hazards-breathing-oil-smoke-7195913.html

What Are the Dangers of Heating Cooking Oil?
https://www.livestrong.com/article/225217-what-are-the-dangers-of-heating-oil/
